entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot reload not working for cshtml #56092
  • Add record struct classifications for EditorFeatures.Cocoa (VSMac) #56083
  • Analyzer not working using Nuget #56076
  • Code action preview shows "no issues found" even if there are conflicts or issues #56074
  • Html.DisplayFor use null conditional operator ?. #56062
  • API proposal: Introduce Minimum[CSharp|VisualBasic]LanguageVersion for refactorings and analyzers #56058

Closed

  • First-chance NativeIntegerTypeDecoder+ErrorTypeException in semantic classifier/binder #49823
    17.0
  • Unexpected result with string interpolation #56061
  • Exceptions in additional sources are reported at a different time #54185
    17.0
  • Merge ExperimentationService into OptionService #43477
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Use NativeIntegerMethodSymbol to represent parameter-less constructor. #56093
    Area-Compilers
  • NRT enable our analzyers lib. #56091
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow converting a lambda with attributes to an expression tree. #56090
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • More options refactoring #56089
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid blocking wait in lsif generator. #56081
    Area-IDE
  • Obsolete Solution.GetIsolatedSolution #56073
    Area-IDE
  • Refactoring #56052
    Area-IDE
  • Move VS lsp client implementation to EditorFeatures for VSMac #56051
    Area-IDE

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56086
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
